snippet: Jonas Abney joined Maxifier, New York, in a new post, vice president for United States sales. He had been head of publisher development and publishing operations at Zumobi.
lead_paragraph: Jonas Abney joined Maxifier, New York, in a new post, vice president for United States sales. He had been head of publisher development and publishing operations at Zumobi.
